channel.title: Timer | Responsive Multipurpose Bootstrap Hugo Template
channel.description: Recent content on Timer | Responsive Multipurpose Bootstrap Hugo Template

item.title: API Authentication Using Passport.js and JSON Web Tokens
item.description: Introduction In this post I will walk you through setting up authentication to your node.js web app using JSON web tokens and the Passport.js local strategy. We’ll start off by installing a number of dependencies npm i express mongoose body-parser passport passport-local passport-local-mongoose jsonwebtokens express: Node.js framework. mongoose: MongoDb Object relational mappper. body-parser: allows us to retrieve request data. passport.js: Authentication middleware.
